name: jq-preview
description: A sample JQ for virtual document

jq.shell.markdownDescription: Path to the shell to use when running jq

jq.customParameters.markdownDescription: Add custom jq parameters here, like -c for compact mode.

jq.customCommand.markdownDescription:
Custom command that supports jq command line options.

 `$$user_filter` is replaced with the filter you typed

 `$$file_path` is replaced with the current file path

jq.customCommandRaw.markdownDescription:
Custom jq command when processing raw JSON data, not a saved file.

 `$$user_filter` is replaced with the filter you typed

 `$$json_data` is replaced with the current JSON data.

jq.customRawDataCommand2.markdownDescription:
Custom jq command when processing raw JSON data, not a saved file.

 `$$user_filter` is replaced with the filter you typed

 `$$json_data` is replaced with the current JSON data.

jq.strictMode.markdownDescription: By default, this extension only works with files with a `json` file identifier. Turn this off if you want to use it everywhere.

jq.queryOnSave.markdownDescription: Turn this on if you want to automatically re-run your jq query when you save a JSON file you've queried already.

jq.outputNewDocument.markdownDescription: If this is enabled, the output will be in a new split-screen document. If not, output will be shown in the jq Output pane.

jq.globalFormulas.markdownDescription: A list of JQ queries that should show up by default for all documents

jq.savedDocumentFormulas.markdownDescription: Set of document IDs and associated arrays of saved JQ queries

editor/title.when: resourceScheme != jq && !config.jq.strictMode || resourceScheme != jq && resourceLangId == json

commandPalette.when: resourceScheme != jq && !config.jq.strictMode || resourceScheme != jq && resourceLangId == json
